message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $18,000. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I can come down to $19,000. This is a very competitive offer for a product of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I can agree to $18,500 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
